sentences.en: a money-back guarantee
sentences.cn: 退货保证

sentences.en: California's state Constitution includes a guarantee of privacy.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚的州宪法涵盖对隐私权的保障.

sentences.en: Can you guarantee me a job when I get there?
sentences.cn: 你可以确保我到那儿就可以找到一份工作 吗 ?

sentences.en: He argues strongly for retention of NATO as a guarantee of peace.
sentences.cn: 他强烈要求保留北大西洋公约组织以维护和平。

sentences.en: He was declared bankrupt after failing to pay a £114m loan guarantee.
sentences.cn: 由于无力偿还1.14亿英镑的贷款担保，他被宣布破产。

sentences.en: His turning up will guarantee the success of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他一出席,会议便成功在望.

sentences.en: I guarantee that if you take this medicine, you'll soon get well.
sentences.cn: 我管保你吃了这药就好.

sentences.en: I guarantee you’ll love this film.
sentences.cn: 我保证你会喜欢这部电影。

sentences.en: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.cn: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

sentences.en: It was still under guarantee.
sentences.cn: 它还在保修期内。

sentences.en: Some builders guarantee their work.
sentences.cn: 一些建筑公司对其承建工程提供质量保证。

sentences.en: The bank is holding the airline’s assets as guarantees.
sentences.cn: 银行持有航空公司的资产作为抵押物。

sentences.en: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.cn: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.en: The Editor can give no guarantee that they will fulfil their obligations.
sentences.cn: 《编辑家》无法保证他们会履行职责.

sentences.en: The guarantee could be worthless if the firm goes out of business.
sentences.cn: 如果厂家倒闭，保修单就会变得毫无用处。

sentences.en: The law guarantees equal rights for men and women.
sentences.cn: 法律保障男女平等。

sentences.en: The new system of waiting lists should guarantee fairness to all patients.
sentences.cn: 新的候诊名单系统应当保证对每一位病人都公平.

sentences.en: They offer a two-year guarantee on all their electrical goods.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的电器产品都有两年的保修期。

sentences.en: to give a guarantee of good behaviour
sentences.cn: 保证行为端正

sentences.en: We guarantee that you will find a community with which to socialise.
sentences.cn: 我们保证你们会找到自己的交际圈。

sentences.en: We guarantee to reply in full within 10 working days.
sentences.cn: 我们保证在10个工作日内悉数回复。

sentences.en: Words of mouth being no guarantee, a written statement is hereby given.
sentences.cn: 空口无凭, 立字为证.

words.tran_cn: 担保（guarantee的过去式和过去分词）
[金融]保证；[法]担保；保证人；保证书；[经]抵押品

phrases.tran_cn: 担保有限公司；保证有限公司
保证保险，盗窃意外保险
履行合同保证人；履约保证

trans.tran_cn: 保证，保修单，起保证的事物，担保金
trans.tran_en: a formal written promise to repair or replace a product if it breaks within a specific period of time
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves

trans.tran_cn: 保证; 担保，保证人，担保物
trans.tran_en: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves

trans.tran_cn: 担保，提供（产品）保修单，确保，承诺对…负法律责任
trans.tran_en: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
